assignments.name: monthRanges
assignments.value:
={{ {
  currentMonth: DateTime.now().startOf('month').toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd'),
  currentMonthEnd: DateTime.now().endOf('month').toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd'),
  lastMonth: DateTime.now().minus({months: 1}).startOf('month').toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd'),
  lastMonthEnd: DateTime.now().minus({months: 1}).endOf('month').toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd'),
  last12MonthsStart: DateTime.now().minus({months: 12}).startOf('month').toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd'),
  monthName: DateTime.now().minus({months: 1}).toFormat('MMMM'),
  monthNumber: DateTime.now().minus({months: 1}).month,
  year: DateTime.now().minus({months: 1}).year,
  quarterStart: DateTime.now().minus({months: 1}).startOf('quarter').toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd'),
  quarterEnd: DateTime.now().minus({months: 1}).endOf('quarter').toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd')
} }}
